attributes.action: Reimburse static caravan owners for their site fees during COVID 19 lockdown.
attributes.additional_details: We have all paid our site fees for the 2020 season at an average cost of £2500 per annum and we are unable to use our holiday homes during lockdown so we would like to be reimbursed or Government should cover the cost of these fees.
attributes.background: Reimburse static caravan owners for their site fees for 2020 during the COVID - 19 lockdown whilst sites are closed.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because arranging refunds or reimbursing people for holidays that could not be taken is not the responsibility of the UK Government.
